title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 22 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 22 2022
description:
Ann Coulter joins the show, in-studio, to discuss Biden's mental capacity, who is the Democrats' best option for 2024, and the need for Republicans to talk about crime, wokeness, and inflation. Opinions on tattoos. Caller explains what it's like to have foxes as pets, since Buck has expressed interest in red foxes. Noah Rothman, associate editor of Commentary Magazine, joins Clay and Buck to discuss his new book: The Rise of the New Puritans: Fighting Back Against Progressives’ War on Fun, and the Russian strategy in Ukraine. C&B take a call from a python attack victim. Steve Bannon found guilty of obstructing Jan. 6 probe.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
